A picture frame can be used as a portable mirror. Simply remove the glass and use the wooden frame as a mirror for touch-ups or selfies.
A picture frame can be used as a magnifying glass. Simply place the frame over a small object or text to enlarge it.
A picture frame can be used as a desk organizer. Use the frame to store pens, pencils, erasers, and other small office supplies.
A picture frame can be used as a photo booth prop. Use the frame as a backdrop for photos with friends and family.
A picture frame can be used as a picture puzzle. Break the frame into smaller pieces and use them to create a fun puzzle.
